tool_description: Consulta de CEP a partir do site dos correios, com fallback local
name: Consulta de CEP
title: Consulta de CEP

api_list.name: CEP
api_list.description: Retorna o endereço a partir do CEP
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://consulta-de-cep1.p.rapidapi.com/cep/15020250"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "consulta-de-cep1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://consulta-de-cep1.p.rapidapi.com/cep/{cep}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "consulta-de-cep1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
